extendedInfo.description: You do not know what your money goes? Only little things you spend? You better pay attention to your money?Simple money saver application that will help you save money. Daily, weekly or monthly period, and you can see your budget. See how much you can spend in fact, it will help you assigned to your salary or pocket money.If you would like to receive notifications that you do not forget to record the cost.Simple widget will help you, record your xpenses.Categories way to save costs: Shoping, Clothes, Books, newspapers, magazines, Cigarette, Travel and transport, Cinema, theater, entertainment, Household, Dogs, cats, pets, Gift, Required things, checks, etc., Cars, keywords: budget, expenses, wallet, money

reviews.comment: Just downloaded to kyocera event the app is really cool fast and easy, kust wish it had a goal tracker too so thats why i gave it 4 instead of a 5 but i will suggest this to my friends over mint app
reviews.author: jennerial
